name: Ukraine Winter Game Jam Submission
description:
This is my first game on Unity. Controls below:

Arrows or WASD to Move. Hold Q to hide in the snow. Hold Left Shift to sprint. Press the Space Bar to eat. ALT+F4 to exit.

The music is all by me and my pal. Ignore the dude talking in the background if you make it to the win screen, I was bored in a zoom class lmao

There are so many things I wanted to add, but didn't have the time to get to before the submission deadline. The big one is procedural level generation and multiple levels. Right now its just a sample level with 50 enemies, but I had plans to make them spawn in from one of many pre-made sections.

There are lots of other things I would add if I ever go back and work on this game more: -effects like blood, footprints, screenshake. -more things in the environment to interact with like snow drifts to hide in or things to throw to make distractions. -some sort of timing or scoring system -better menu screens and a tutorial
